slides.title: What was the Enlightenment?

text.text: A Basic Definition
More than great men thinking great things.
Where and how did did the Enlightenment happen?
Created new ways of interacting with one another: Public Sphere

slides.rightText: New discourses (ideas, theories, criticism, rumors, etc.) that challenged the existing political system (the Anci√®n Regime).

slides.title: The Traditional History of the Enlightenment: Ideas

text.text: The Enlightenment was a period of time in which great thinkers came up with new ideas.
